Office of the Mayor - City of Gold Bar est. 1910



Office of the Mayor
===================



### **Mayor of Gold Bar**

Mayor Steve Yarbrough  took office at the regularly scheduled City of Gold Bar Council Meeting on January 4th, 2022.

Mayor Steve Yarbrough cell – 425.238.2655
Contact the Mayor by email at
**[mayor@cityofgoldbar.us](mailto:mayor@cityofgoldbar.us)**

**Oath of Office
– Mayor Yarbrough**

* [Public Hearing Notice For City of Gold Bar Council Meeting on Tuesday, November 18th, 2025](https://cityofgoldbar.us/public-hearing-notice-for-city-of-gold-bar-council-meeting-on-tuesday-november-18th-2025/)
